0 Island-Americana Cuisine in The Heart of James Island Nestled in the picturesque James Island, The Harlow is a culinary beacon where the rich traditions of Lowcountry seafood effortlessly merge with timeless American classics. RESERVATIONS Call 843-459-2867 or Book Online THE MENU Good Eats Make Good Neighbors • Good Eats Make Good Neighbors • Good Eats Make Good Neighbors • Eat your heart out James Island MENU Let’s Get Social Follow Us Keep Me In The Loop Get updates on what’s cookin’ & special events Sign Me Up

0 Welcome to The Harlow Coastal Americana & Seafood Located in the picturesque low country of James Island, SC. Reserve Your Table Now ADDRESS 1015 Harbor View Road, Charleston SC 29412 PHONE 843-459-2867 HOURS Mon-Thu • 5pm-10pm Fri-Sat • 5pm-10:30pm Sun Brunch • 11am-3:30pm "Food, atmosphere, and service was AMAZING. The Harlow exceeded all my expectations. Will be taking my family and friends there!" - KAYLA W. "Great food and super nice staff!" -NATHAN B. "Amazing addition to JI. Staff is welcoming and knowledgeable and the food is drool worthy." -Katie I. "Highly recommend! The Harlow burger is probably the best burger (definitely best cooked) I've had in Charleston….Will be going back very soon!" -Mat G.
